languages.text: "Когда почтенный Лорд-инквизитор призвал Вольных Торговцев примкнуть к его войскам, досточтимая Инцендия Чорда откликнулась на зов, но досточтимый Каллигос Винтерскейл... проигнорировал его. Ходят слухи, что отказ был... вызывающим, и послужил поводом для госпожи Чорда объявить войну династии Винтерскейл".

traits.locale_text: "Когда почтенный Лорд-инквизитор призвал Вольных Торговцев примкнуть к его войскам, досточтимая Инцендия Чорда откликнулась на зов, но досточтимый Каллигос Винтерскейл... проигнорировал его. Ходят слухи, что отказ был... вызывающим, и послужил поводом для госпожи Чорда объявить войну династии Винтерскейл".
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: "When the esteemed Lord Inquisitor called upon the Rogue Traders to join his forces, Her Ladyship Incendia Chorda heeded the summons, while His Lordship Calligos Winterscale... ignored it. Rumour has it that his refusal was... defiant in manner, and served as a pretext for Lady Chorda to declare war on House Winterscale."
languages.original_text: "Когда почтенный Лорд-инквизитор призвал Вольных Торговцев примкнуть к его войскам, досточтимая Инцендия Чорда откликнулась на зов, но досточтимый Каллигос Винтерскейл... проигнорировал его. Ходят слухи, что отказ был... вызывающим, и послужил поводом для госпожи Чорда объявить войну династии Винтерскейл".

traits.locale_text: "When the esteemed Lord Inquisitor called upon the Rogue Traders to join his forces, Her Ladyship Incendia Chorda heeded the summons, while His Lordship Calligos Winterscale... ignored it. His refusal is rumoured to have been... provocative in its manner, causing Lady Chorda to declare war on House Winterscale."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

Rumour has it that his refusal was... defiant in manner, and served as a pretext for Lady Chorda to declare war on House Winterscale."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: «Cuando el estimado Lord Inquisidor apeló a los Comerciantes Independientes para instarles a que se unieran a su armada, lady Incendia Chorda respondió al llamamiento, pero lord Calligos Winterscale... la ignoró. Se rumorea que su negativa fue un tanto... insolente, y sirvió como pretexto para que lady Chorda declarase la guerra a la casa Winterscale».
languages.original_text: "When the esteemed Lord Inquisitor called upon the Rogue Traders to join his forces, Her Ladyship Incendia Chorda heeded the summons, while His Lordship Calligos Winterscale... ignored it. Rumour has it that his refusal was... defiant in manner, and served as a pretext for Lady Chorda to declare war on House Winterscale."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando el estimado Lord Inquisidor apeló a los Comerciantes Independientes para instarles a que se unieran a su armada, lady Incendia Chorda respondió al llamamiento, pero lord Calligos Winterscale... la ignoró. Se rumorea que su negativa fue un tanto... insolente, y sirvió como pretexto para que lady Chorda declarase la guerra a la casa Winterscale».
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: “尊敬的大审判官大人呼吁行商浪人加入他的军队。因森蒂娅·库尔达大人听从了召唤，而卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔大人……无视了它。有传言说，他的拒绝是……某种挑衅姿态。于是库尔达女士以此为由，向温特斯凯尔家族宣战。”
languages.original_text: "When the esteemed Lord Inquisitor called upon the Rogue Traders to join his forces, Her Ladyship Incendia Chorda heeded the summons, while His Lordship Calligos Winterscale... ignored it. Rumour has it that his refusal was... defiant in manner, and served as a pretext for Lady Chorda to declare war on House Winterscale."

traits.locale_text: “尊敬的审判长大人呼吁行商浪人加入他的军队。因森蒂娅·库尔达大人听从了召唤，而卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔大人……无视了它。有传言说，他的拒绝是……某种挑衅姿态。于是库尔达女士以此为由，向温特斯凯尔家族宣战。”
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: « Quand l'estimé seigneur inquisiteur a demandé aux libres-marchands de se joindre à ses forces, dame Incendia Chorda a répondu à l'appel, tandis que le seigneur Calligos Winterscale l'a ignoré. D'après la rumeur, son refus était quelque peu... provocateur et a servi de prétexte à dame Chorda pour déclarer la guerre à la maison Winterscale. »
languages.original_text: "When the esteemed Lord Inquisitor called upon the Rogue Traders to join his forces, Her Ladyship Incendia Chorda heeded the summons, while His Lordship Calligos Winterscale... ignored it. Rumour has it that his refusal was... defiant in manner, and served as a pretext for Lady Chorda to declare war on House Winterscale."

traits.locale_text: « Quand l'estimé seigneur inquisiteur a demandé aux libres-marchands de se joindre à ses forces, dame Incendia Chorda a répondu à l'appel, tandis que le seigneur Calligos Winterscale l'a ignoré. D'après la rumeur, son refus était quelque peu... provocateur et a servi de prétexte à dame Chorda pour déclarer la guerre à la maison Winterscale. »
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: 「敬愛すべきロード・インクィジターがローグトレーダーに参戦を呼びかけた時、インセンディア・チョーダ女史は召喚に応じたのですが、カリゴス・ウィンタースケールは要請を無視したのです。 噂によれば…その拒否した際の態度があまりにも反抗的なものであり、それがチョーダ女史のウィンタースケールへの宣戦布告の口実となったそうです」
languages.original_text: "When the esteemed Lord Inquisitor called upon the Rogue Traders to join his forces, Her Ladyship Incendia Chorda heeded the summons, while His Lordship Calligos Winterscale... ignored it. Rumour has it that his refusal was... defiant in manner, and served as a pretext for Lady Chorda to declare war on House Winterscale."

traits.locale_text: 「敬愛すべきロード・インクィジターがローグトレーダーに参戦を呼びかけた時、インセンディア・チョーダ女史は召喚に応じたのですが、カリゴス・ウィンタースケールは要請を無視したのです。 噂によれば…その拒否した際の態度があまりにも反抗的なものであり、それがチョーダ女史のウィンタースケールへの宣戦布告の口実となったそうです」
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: "Als der verehrte Großinquisitor die Freihändler aufgefordert hat, sich zusammenzuschließen, ist ihre Ladyschaft Incendia Chorda dem Ruf gefolgt, während seine Lordschaft Calligos Winterzunder ... ihn ignoriert hat. Gerüchten zufolge war seine Weigerung ... trotziger Natur und diente Lady Chorda als Vorwand, um Haus Winterzunder den Krieg zu erklären."
languages.original_text: "When the esteemed Lord Inquisitor called upon the Rogue Traders to join his forces, Her Ladyship Incendia Chorda heeded the summons, while His Lordship Calligos Winterscale... ignored it. Rumour has it that his refusal was... defiant in manner, and served as a pretext for Lady Chorda to declare war on House Winterscale."

traits.locale_text: "Als der verehrte Großinquisitor die Freihändler aufgefordert hat, sich zusammenzuschließen, ist ihre Ladyschaft Incendia Chorda dem Ruf gefolgt, während seine Lordschaft Calligos Winterzunder ... ihn ignoriert hat. Gerüchten zufolge war seine Weigerung ... trotziger Natur und diente Lady Chorda als Vorwand, um Haus Winterzunder den Krieg zu erklären."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: "Saygıdeğer Lord Engizisyoncu, Hür Tacirleri kuvvetlerine katılmaya çağırdı. Leydi İncendia Chorda Hazretleri, çağrıya kulak verdi. Lord Calligos Winterscale Hazretleri ise hiç umursamadı. Söylentilere göre çağrıyı küstahça reddetmiş. Bu da Leydi Chorda'ya, Winterscale Hanesi'ne savaş açmak için mazeret oldu."
languages.original_text: "When the esteemed Lord Inquisitor called upon the Rogue Traders to join his forces, Her Ladyship Incendia Chorda heeded the summons, while His Lordship Calligos Winterscale... ignored it. Rumour has it that his refusal was... defiant in manner, and served as a pretext for Lady Chorda to declare war on House Winterscale."

traits.locale_text: "Saygıdeğer Lord Engizisyoncu Hür Tacirleri kuvvetlerine katılmaları için çağırdığında Leydi Hazretleri İncendia Chorda, çağrıya kulak verdi ancak Lord Hazretleri Calligos Winterscale hiç umursamadı. Söylentilere göre çağrıyı reddetmesi meydan okumak içinmiş ve Leydi Chorda'ya, Winterscale Hanesi'ne savaş açmak için mazeret olmuş."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum
